A New Beginning

Aug 25, 2015

I’ve been blogging on and off for a few years now but I never really made it a priority.

I fully intend to change that. My goal is at least two articles per month.

As a first step, I’ve let myself inspired by Ash Furrow and Ole Begemann and switched my blogging engine from Wordpress to Middleman. While at it, I also borrowed the Clean Blog implementation from Ash.

Onwards…
